text: The mouse B cell line A20.2J has been previously described [ 26 ] , [ 27 ] .
Cells were grown in RPMI 1640 , 10 % FCS , 10 microM 2-ME , 2 mM L-glutamine , and antibiotics .
HI-5 insect cells ( Invitrogen ) expressing <extra_id_0> CD154 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> have been described [ 28 ] .
